title: Fix calendar visibility issue in appointment dialog

requirements.text: Fix the calendar component in the New Appointment dialog so that the entire calendar is visible instead of only half being shown. The calendar should display all weeks of the month with proper spacing and not be cut off.

quotes: There is issue with calender only half calender is visible

acceptanceCriteria: The calendar in the New Appointment dialog shows all dates of the current month without any being cut off
All calendar navigation controls (month/year selector, arrows) are fully visible
The calendar maintains proper spacing and layout on mobile devices
Users can see and select any date in the calendar without scrolling or resizing the dialog

constraints: Do not modify the immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, or components/ui directory
Maintain the existing React + Tailwind + Shadcn stack
Ensure the fix works on mobile devices as shown in the screenshot
nonGoals: Adding new calendar features or functionality
